summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the core functionalities of the MRA model, including its configuration, loading mechanisms, attention mechanisms, and performance across multiple NLP tasks such as masked language modeling, multiple-choice, question answering, sequence and token classification, as well as its handling of different embedding types and training optimizations like gradient checkpointing.
business_intent: Guarantee the model's reliability and correctness for production NLP pipelines by detecting regressions and confirming that all supported features and training options work as expected before deployment.
